summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Jay Lipman and Amanda Kirby regarding the movement of securities in Southern Financial and Southern Trust. The emails include references to spreadsheets detailing holdings and are classified for internal use only.

persons.name: Jay Lipman
persons.context: Jay Lipman is an Analyst in the markets Coverage Group at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc, involved in discussions about moving securities.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an Associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, communicating with Jay Lipman about securities holdings.

connections.description: Both individuals work at Deutsche Bank, with Jay being an Analyst and Amanda an Associate, collaborating on securities matters.

keyFacts: The document contains email correspondence dated October 1, 2013.
Jay Lipman and Amanda Kirby discuss moving securities in Southern Financial and Southern Trust.
The emails include references to spreadsheets detailing holdings for Southern Financial and Southern Trust.
The correspondence is classified for internal use only.
The document is marked as confidential pursuant to Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e).
